pr_title: fix(TDI-44568): Update Apache POI version in components

timeline.bodyText:
I see that some of the poi jar with "_modified_talend" have been replace with offical poi jar.
https://github.com/Talend/tdi-studio-se/blob/ba747020ec0669c31d82c4fd02d2c1fa104343c0/main/plugins/org.talend.designer.components.localprovider/components/tFileInputExcel/REAME_MODIFICATION_TALEND.txt
do you means those modification have been include in offical poi jar ?
timeline.author: jzhao-talend
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -177,20 +177,24 @@
 	<CODEGENERATION>
 		<IMPORTS>

timeline.message: fix(TDI-44568): Update Apache POI version in components
fix(TDI-44568): Update Apache POI version in components
fix(TDI-44568): use custom POI libraries in components
fix(TDI-44568): use custom POI libraries in components
fix(TDI-44568): Jasper components to use previous POI version (could not be updated that easy).
